title: Corner Apt with Private Deck at Motiv Apartments! - #313
posting_body: ['Corner Apartment with Private Deck at Motiv Apartments #313', 'Property Address', '1006 West 24th Street - 313 | Minneapolis, MN 55405', 'Available:', '09/01/2022', 'Offered By', 'At Home Apartments |', 'show contact info', 'Description', 'Walk, bike, or relax near the lakes and grab a latte on your adventure through the Uptown and Lowry Hill neighborhoods.', 'Enjoy walking and biking access to everything in Uptown- and easy transit options to go everywhere else.', 'Built in 2015, Motiv is the destination and hub of your urban lifestyle.', 'All apartments offer modern and convenient living.', 'The building has free bike storage in the bike garage and a rooftop patio with a community grill.', 'Metro transit commuters have stops within two blocks of the building and drivers can easily access the main highways.', 'Apartment 313 is a third-floor, corner one-bedroom apartment with a one-of-a-kind modern living space in this charming, historic neighborhood.', 'Its large windows allow for great natural light and the open floor plan will give you plenty of space for working from home.', 'The kitchen features quartz countertops, dark maple cabinetry, and full-size stainless steel appliances- including a dishwasher and microwave.', 'The large kitchen island is great for food prep and entertaining.', 'The apartment has a walk-in closet off of the bedroom along with several Ikea Pax closets in the main hallway for additional storage.', 'There is also a private patio with great West facing views!', 'Cats are welcome with a $200 pet deposit, a $200 pet fee, and $35/month pet rent per cat (max 2).', 'Surface lot parking available for $50/month and garage spaces available for $125/month.', 'Call the Motiv Leasing Office at', 'show contact info', 'to view this incredible apartment!', 'Check out our virtual walk-through of Floorplan J: <URL>', '**Admin fee of $150 due at the lease signing**', 'County: Hennepin • School District: Minneapolis', 'The link below details the average energy costs per bedroom at Motiv (please note that this is an average based on aggregate data for the whole building for the past 2 years, and your monthly bill may differ from this estimate):', '<URL>', 'Additional photos and availability at <URL>.', 'View more properties at <URL>', 'Amenities', 'Keyless Entry', 'Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Bike Storage', 'Off-street
